text: Hi Chris â€“ do you have the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/developer-reference/local-development-cli|HubSpot CLI> installed? You need to authenticate with your account using `hs init` and then use `hs upload <src> <dest>` to upload the theme directory.
I do have have HubSpot CLI installed and I did the configuration using hs init. But I don't have a source file since I didn't create the boilerplate.
Since I was trying to create a simple theme, I thought I would not use the boilerplate. Is that logic incorrect?
That's fine. You should be able to upload any directory that you have locally, e.g., `hs upload theme-folder theme-folder`
